statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT location, quantity, product_id FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) FROM Inventory GROUP BY location HAVING SUM(quantity) > 50
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT location, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location, product_id FROM Inventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_id, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT location, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location LIKE '%A%' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' OR location LIKE '%Store%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND location IN ('Main Storage', 'Backroom') ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY location;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Stockholm';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY location ASC, product_id;

SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory JOIN Locations ON Inventory.location = Locations.location_name GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, location_name FROM Products FULL JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id JOIN Locations ON Inventory.location = Locations.location_name WHERE quantity <> 0 ORDER BY product_name, location_name;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT location, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT location_name FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, transaction_type FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Locations ON Inventory.location = Locations.location_name GROUP BY location_name;

SELECT transaction_id, Products.product_name, Inventory.quantity, Locations.location_name FROM InventoryTransactions INNER JOIN Products ON InventoryTransactions.product_id = Products.product_id INNER JOIN Locations ON InventoryTransactions.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) as total_quantity, AVG(price) as average_price FROM Inventory INNER JOIN Products ON Inventory.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, location, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_id, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_id, location FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT product_id, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalProducts FROM Inventory WHERE quantity <= 5
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS AvgQuantity, MAX(quantity) AS MaxQuantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY location HAVING MAX(quantity) > 50
